CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole exhibit similar HOMO / LUMO levels to homopolymer P6 , while the stronger electronaccepting unit benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole reduced the LUMO by 0.28 eV.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| 2,2 0 -bithiazole |
| homopolymer P6 |
| benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. The other words in the paragraph, such as "P3 and P4", "weak electron - deficient", "electronaccepting unit", "HOMO / LUMO levels", "reduced", and "0.28 eV", do not refer to specific material names.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole exhibit similar HOMO / LUMO levels to homopolymer P6 , while the stronger electronaccepting unit benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole reduced the LUMO by 0.28 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole) |
| LUMO (P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole) |
| HOMO (homopolymer P6) |
| LUMO (homopolymer P6) |
| LUMO (stronger electronaccepting unit benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole) |
| LUMO (P3 and P4 with weak electron - deficient unit 2,2 0 -bithiazole) |
| HOMO (homopolymer P6) |
| LUMO (homopolymer P6) |
| LUMO (stronger electronaccepting unit benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole) |

These entities refer to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (HOMO) and Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital (LUMO) energy levels of specific polymers (P3, P4, and P6) and a stronger electronaccepting unit (benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole).
